fields.label: Does your program include risk-based systems and controls to be reasonably satisfied that a government body customer exists?
fields.detail-label: Describe the risk-based systems and controls used to verify the existence of government bodies.

fields.label: Does your program include systems to be satisfied that information about beneficial owners has been provided for certain kinds of government bodies?
fields.detail-label: Describe the systems used to ensure beneficial ownership information is provided for relevant government bodies.

fields.label: Does your business collect the full name of the government body?
Does your business collect the full address of the government body's principal place of operations?
Does your business collect whether the government body is an entity, emanation, or established under legislation of the Commonwealth?
Does your business collect whether the government body is an entity, emanation, or established under legislation of a State, Territory, or foreign country?
If applicable, does your business collect the name of the specific State, Territory, or foreign country?
Does your business have risk-based systems to determine if any other KYC information relating to the government body's existence should be collected?
fields.detail-label: Describe the risk-based systems and controls used to determine if additional KYC information is required.

fields.label: Does your business verify the collected information using reliable and independent documentation or electronic data?
fields.detail-label: Specify the reliable and independent documentation or data sources used for verification.

fields.label: Does your business have risk-based systems to determine if additional KYC information (beyond the minimum) should be verified?
fields.detail-label: Describe the criteria for determining which additional KYC information should be verified.

fields.label: Does your business have systems to determine whether to collect KYC information about the ownership or control of a foreign government body?
fields.detail-label: Describe the systems used to determine if ownership or control information for foreign government bodies is required.

fields.label: Does your business have systems to determine whether to verify the ownership or control information collected for foreign government bodies?
fields.detail-label: Describe the systems used to determine whether to verify ownership or control information for foreign government bodies.

fields.label: Does your business have risk-based systems to respond to discrepancies that arise during the verification of a government body?
fields.detail-label: Describe the procedure for responding to and resolving discrepancies identified during verification.

groups.title: Part 4.8: Government Bodies
groups.description: Applicable customer identification procedures with respect to domestic and foreign government bodies.

groups.title: General Requirements
groups.description: Mandatory risk-based systems to ensure the existence of the entity and identification of beneficial owners.

groups.title: Collection of Information
groups.description: Minimum KYC information required for government bodies (Clause 4.8.3).

groups.title: Verification and Additional KYC
groups.description: Procedures for verifying identity and determining if further information is required based on risk.

groups.title: Foreign Government Entities
groups.description: Specific requirements for identifying ownership and control of foreign government emanations.

groups.title: Responding to Discrepancies
groups.description: Systems for handling information conflicts to ensure the entity is reasonably satisfied of the customer's identity.
